NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 2? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Commodities}'s peak at {21},{Stock Market}'s peak at {15},{Real Estate}'s peak at {4}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 18? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Real Estate or Peer-to-Peer Lending?
NC.A: {Real Estate} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Commodities or Real Estate?
NC.A: {Commodities} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Venture Capital or Real Estate?
NC.A: {Real Estate} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Commodities or Stock Market?
NC.A: {Commodities} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {2} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.
